about_the_game:
Same story, different fate...
Re-discover the story of MoonBright through Rebecca Vega's point of view with this free digital comic!

Year 200X, Puerto Pimiento, day of the Lunar Festival.
Rebecca Vega, a spunky 20-year-old, becomes embroiled in a mystery that could change the fate of humanity.
Suspecting that Bridge Corp is about to set its plan in motion at the upcoming Lunar Festival, an annual event that attracts thousands of spectators, Rebecca Vega decides to take matters into her own hands. Equipped with her intelligence, skill and determination, she embarks on a mission to expose the company and stop the lunar laser before it wreaks havoc.
As Rebecca digs deep, she uncovers a web of secrets, conspiracies and hidden plots. Along the way, she surrounds herself with a diverse group of allies, from tech experts to unexpected friendships.
Time is running out, and Rebecca must prepare to face the malevolent forces guarding the lunar laser on the day of the Lunar Festival. In a race against the clock, our heroine will fight not only for her survival, but for the future of Port Pepper and Earth itself.
Can Rebecca defeat Bridge Corp and save the moon on Lunar Festival Day?
